titles.title: There’s a light upon the mountains

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}There’s a light upon the mountains, and the day is at the spring, When our eyes shall see the beauty and the glory of the King; Weary was our heart with waiting, and the night-watch seemed so long, But His triumph-day is breaking, and we hail it with a song.{/lang-eng}
